p: Tetracyclines are a group of antibiotics that possess anti-inflammatory, antiapoptotic, antiproteolytic, and antiangiogenic effects [ 14]. The chemically modified tetracyclines (CMTs) have the nonantimicrobial characteristics of the original compounds, such as regulation of release of inflammatory cytokines, activation or inhibition of leukocyte chemotaxis action, and antioxidative properties [ 15].
